update.description:
* Protobuf messages to match the new C structs.
* haptix_sim_utils.h: Helper file that has a bunch of functions from converting between protobuf and structs.
* haptix_sim.cc: For each function defined in the API, we convert the struct to a protobuf, make the request using ign-transport and (if needed) create a struct with the response.
* haptix_sim_TEST.cc: Unit test.
update.title: Haptix_sim implementation

content.raw: I don't think we need it. This is a protobuf message that we know is empty. In any case in all the internal `hxs_convert...` functions we clear the protobuf messages that are passed as outputs.
content.html: I don't think we need it. This is a protobuf message that we know is empty. In any case in all the internal hxs_convert... functions we clear the protobuf messages that are passed as outputs.

content.raw: I don't think we need to do anything here. This is a protobuf message that we know is empty. In any case in all the internal `hxs_convert...` functions we clear the protobuf messages that are passed as outputs.
content.html: I don't think we need to do anything here. This is a protobuf message that we know is empty. In any case in all the internal hxs_convert... functions we clear the protobuf messages that are passed as outputs.

content.raw: Yeah, the example was there to make sure that everything compiles and executes properly. We'll make a better example afterwards.
content.html: Yeah, the example was there to make sure that everything compiles and executes properly. We'll make a better example afterwards.

content.raw: I was playing around with making a fuller example here, but I think this isn't quite the state the example should take yet. We can address it in the next PR, which will be accompanied by a tutorial.

content.raw: @jacquelinekay , I removed the `imu`, `quaternion`, and `time` messages inside `hxSensor` in favor of `hxVector3`, `hxQuaternion` and `hxTime`. We'll have to update handsim.
content.html: @jacquelinekay , I removed the imu, quaternion, and time messages inside hxSensor in favor of hxVector3, hxQuaternion and hxTime. We'll have to update handsim.

content.html:
Updated: I added the implementation for the latest functions discussed in this haptix_api pull request:

hxResult hxs_set_model_color(const char *_model, const hxColor *_color);
hxResult hxs_model_color(const char *_model, hxColor *_color);
hxResult hxs_set_model_collide_mode(const char *_model, const hxCollisionMode *_collide_mode);
hxResult hxs_model_collide_mode(const char *_model, hxCollisionMode *_collide_mode);
